description.value: Character is trained in the use of a Single Exotic Weapon (EG: Harlequinn's Kiss) or Exotic Weapon Type (EG: Needle/Digital Weapons), and can use it without the -20 Penalty. Talent can be taken multiple times for different weapons.

specialAbilities.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
specialAbilities.description: Choose one exotic weapon or exotic weapon type. You can use it without the -20 untrained penalty. Can be taken multiple times for different weapons.
